content:
Name Crit Effect Type
This is Bad You take 1d10 persistent bleed damage. Melee
What are the Odds? If this is a thrown weapon attack and the target can hold the weapon, the target snatches the weapon out of the air and wields it. Ranged
Whirlwind of Shame You hit the creature adjacent to your except for the target. Unarmed
Jumbled Components You are slowed 2 until the end of your next turn. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #45
